roleset.name: shudder
roleset.note: SHUDDER-V NOTES: Member of Vncls body_internal_states-40.6. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from shudder.01-v)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: I shuddered and backed out of the room.

example.name: intransitive, inanimate
example.text: Greg tightened his turn until the plane shuddered.

example.name: with arg2
example.text: Both shudder at the thought of proceeding too far beyond the sewage system and the electric light lines.
example.arg: at the thought of proceeding too far beyond the sewage system and the electric light lines
